meanings.definition: A type of igneous rock containing plagioclase and alkali feldspar.
meanings.sent1: Geologists study monzonites to understand different rock formations.
meanings.sent2: Miners found a large deposit of monzonites in the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The monzonites in the quarry seemed to play hide and seek with the workers.
meanings.sent4: The monzonites stood out in the landscape like giant puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the monzonites sparkled in the sunlight, creating a beautiful sight.
